com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection

Class SafeField<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection.SafeField<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the Field
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldAccessor<T>

    public class SafeField<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FieldAccessor<T>
    Wraps around the java.lang.reflect.Field class to provide an error-free alternative
    Exceptions are logged, isValid can be used to check if the Field is actually working

      • create

        public static <T> TranslatorFieldAccessor<T> create(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    ConverterPair<?,T> converterPair)
        Creates a new SafeField instance pointing to the field found in the given class type. Exposes to the outside world using a translator.
        Parameters:
        type - - class type to find the field in
        name - - field name
        converterPair - - used to convert between exposed and stored types
        Returns:
        new TranslatorFieldAccessor backed by a SafeField
